summary: These are November 30, 2021, preparation notes for Assistant U.S. Attorneys, summarizing an interview with a former employee (referred to as 'U' or 'I') of Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell. The notes detail the employee's recollections of a private address book, the layout of Epstein's Palm Beach residence, and a strict household manual with rules for staff. The employee describes seeing names including Prince Andrew and Donald Trump in the address book.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Referred to as JE. The former employee describes his employment for Epstein, Epstein's use of a private address book, his desk locations in the Palm Beach house, and specific rules from a household manual.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Referred to as GM. The former employee describes her role in enforcing a strict household manual, her desk location, her dog, and her use of the same private address book as Epstein.

persons.name: Prince Andrew
persons.context: Named as one of the individuals whose name appeared in the private address book kept by Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell.

persons.name: Donald Trump
persons.context: Named as one of the individuals whose name appeared in the private address book kept by Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell.

connections.description: Described as jointly employing staff, sharing a private address book with contacts, and co-authoring/enforcing a strict household manual for their Palm Beach residence.
U was employed by Jeffrey Epstein at his Palm Beach residence from the mid-1990s to 2002, performing household duties and following specific instructions.
U took direct instructions from Ghislaine Maxwell, who enforced the household manual and managed daily operations at the Palm Beach residence.
Prince Andrew's name and contact information were listed in the private address book maintained by Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell.
Donald Trump's name and contact information were listed in the private address book maintained by Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell.

events.title: First Observation of Address Book
events.description: The witness (U) first observed a dark blue or black, thick, blank-covered address book at Jeffrey Epstein's Palm Beach residence.

events.title: Receipt of Household Manual
events.description: U received a detailed household manual/booklet from a woman described as a 'duchess from England,' hired by Epstein and Maxwell, outlining strict rules for staff.

events.title: End of U's Employment
events.description: U's employment at Jeffrey Epstein's Palm Beach residence ended.

locations: Palm Beach (PB) residence of Jeffrey Epstein
JE's desk in the living room (Lake Room)
JE's desk in the master bedroom
JE's night table in the master bedroom
GM's desk in the Garden Room
Pool house at JE PB property
keyFacts: A former employee described a private, updated address book kept by Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell that contained 200-300 pages of names, addresses, and phone numbers for friends, employees, and contacts, including Prince Andrew and Donald Trump.
The address books were placed in multiple specific locations throughout the Palm Beach residence and were replaced with updated versions annually.

Epstein and Maxwell enforced a strict, detailed household manual for staff, which included rules on invisibility, confidentiality, specific checklists, and the disposal of all food whenever Epstein left the residence.

The witness's description of the residence layout and specific rooms (like the massage area in Epstein's bathroom and the location of a basket of sex toys in Maxwell's bathroom) corroborates other evidence in the case.
The notes indicate a pattern of meticulous control and secrecy enforced by Epstein and Maxwell over their staff and household operations.
